AttackTell.TellText: The bushi shifts into seigan stance, katana poised for a measured kesa-giri cut.

Outcome.ResponseText: You deflect the blade with a textbook parry, steel ringing!
Your guard absorbs the disciplined diagonal cut.
You evade most of the arc but it grazes your haori.
Bracing does little against the focused cut.
The katana connects with trained precision.

AttackTell.TellText: The bushi drops into chudan, katana tip aligned for a swift tsuki thrust.

Outcome.ResponseText: You pivot aside as the thrust extends past you.
You redirect the thrust, steel scraping steel.
The piercing attack partially bypasses your guard.
Bracing offers no protection against the precise thrust.
The blade finds its mark with surgical precision.

AttackTell.TellText: The bushi raises their katana high in jodan, preparing a devastating men strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You catch the overhead strike solidly, absorbing the blow.
You roll aside as the blade whistles down.
The weight behind the blow is too much to redirect fully.
You absorb some impact but still stagger.
The crushing blow lands with devastating force.

AttackTell.TellText: The bushi drops low, katana sweeping in a swift do cut toward your legs.

Outcome.ResponseText: You leap over the sweeping blade perfectly.
You deflect the sweep downward.
The angle makes a clean parry difficult.
Bracing low helps but you still take the hit.
The blade cuts across your legs.

AttackTell.TellText: The bushi reverses their grip, tsuka rising for a swift kashira strike.

Outcome.ResponseText: You deflect the pommel away from your face.
You lean back just in time.
You knock the arm aside but the strike still grazes you.
Bracing does nothing against a blow to the head.
Stars explode in your vision as the kashira connects.

AttackTell.TellText: The shinobi's blade weaves in deceptive patterns, impossible to read.

Outcome.ResponseText: You hold steady, ready for anything.
Your guard catches the real attack, barely.
You dodge the wrong way - the real strike finds you.
You parry air as the true strike comes from elsewhere.
The deceptive strike finds its mark.

AttackTell.TellText: The sohei's eyes blaze with righteous fury as they unleash a storm of strikes.

Outcome.ResponseText: You weather the onslaught behind your guard.
You endure the battering, blow after blow.
You evade some strikes but others find their mark.
The speed and fury make parrying impossible.
The barrage of strikes beats you mercilessly.

AttackTell.TellText: With a battle sutra on their lips, the sohei swings their naginata in a devastating arc.

Outcome.ResponseText: You throw yourself clear of the sweeping polearm!
Your guard holds but your arms go numb from impact.
The sheer force behind the swing overwhelms your parry.
You hunker down but still get knocked aside.
The naginata sends you reeling.

AttackTell.TellText: The sohei raises their tetsubo overhead, roaring a sacred invocation.

Outcome.ResponseText: You dive clear as the iron club craters the earth!
Your guard buckles under the tremendous force.
Even braced, the impact drives you to your knees.
Attempting to parry that is nearly suicidal.
The crushing tetsubo flattens you.

AttackTell.TellText: The bushi tucks behind their tate shield, driving forward with armored weight.

Outcome.ResponseText: You pivot aside, leaving them stumbling past!
You plant your feet and absorb the impact.
Shield meets guard in a jarring collision.
There's no blade to parry, only momentum.
The shield slam knocks you back hard.

AttackTell.TellText: The ashigaru raises their tate high and brings it down edge-first.

Outcome.ResponseText: You step back as the shield crashes down.
You catch the rim on your guard.
You knock the shield aside but the impact still rattles you.
The shield edge crashes into you despite bracing.
The shield edge cracks into you.

AttackTell.TellText: The sumo-sized bandit spreads meaty arms wide, lunging to grab you.

Outcome.ResponseText: You slip past the grasping hands!
You knock their arms aside.
Your guard creates distance.
Bracing makes you easier to grab.
Massive hands seize you in a crushing grip.

AttackTell.TellText: The sohei charges forward, naginata leveled like a mounted lance.

Outcome.ResponseText: You sidestep the reckless charge!
You plant your feet and barely hold ground.
Your guard buckles under the momentum.
There's nothing to parry - only raw force.
The charge tramples you completely.

AttackTell.TellText: The sohei's voice rises in a powerful kiai that seems to shake the air itself.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your mind against the spirit-shaking shout.
Your guard provides some physical protection but the fear seeps through.
You can't dodge sound - the roar washes over you.
You can't parry a battle cry.
The thunderous kiai shakes you to your core.

AttackTell.TellText: The yumitori nocks and draws their yumi in one fluid kyudo motion.

Outcome.ResponseText: You twist aside as the ya whistles past.
Your guard catches the arrow.
Bracing does little against a piercing arrow.
Parrying an arrow is nearly impossible.
The arrow strikes true.

AttackTell.TellText: The yumitori holds at full draw, sighting with preternatural patience.

Outcome.ResponseText: You move but the archer tracks you - it still clips you.
The powerful shot punches into your guard.
Bracing makes you an easier target.
The arrow is too fast and precise to parry.
The perfectly aimed arrow finds its mark.

AttackTell.TellText: The yumitori draws three arrows at once, fanning them between fingers.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard intercepts most of the volley.
You hunker down as arrows rain around you.
You dodge some arrows but not all.
You can only parry one arrow at a time.
Multiple arrows pepper your body.

AttackTell.TellText: The shinobi's hand blurs as they draw and hurl shuriken.

Outcome.ResponseText: You lean aside as the shuriken spins past your ear.
You knock the spinning blade aside.
The knife thuds into your guard.
Bracing doesn't help against thrown weapons.
The shuriken buries itself in your flesh.

AttackTell.TellText: The yumitori signals - you hear bamboo creak beneath your feet.

Outcome.ResponseText: You leap away just as the snare springs!
You minimize damage but still trigger the trap.
Your guard doesn't help against a floor trap.
You can't parry a trap.
The trap catches you completely off guard.

AttackTell.TellText: The onmyoji traces fire kanji in the air, an ofuda igniting with kitsune-bi.

Outcome.ResponseText: You weave aside as the fox-fire scorches past.
Your guard disperses some of the spirit flames.
You endure the searing heat.
You can't parry fire.
The kitsune-bi explodes against you.

AttackTell.TellText: Frost forms as the onmyoji invokes the yuki-onna, ice crystallizing.

Outcome.ResponseText: You duck as ice shards shatter behind you.
Your guard deflects the frozen projectiles.
The cold bites deep even through your resistance.
You shatter some shards but others find their mark.
Ice shards pierce and freeze your flesh.

AttackTell.TellText: The onmyoji raises their shakujo, calling down raijin's fury.

Outcome.ResponseText: You move but lightning follows the staff's aim!
You ground yourself, reducing the shock.
Your guard conducts the electricity painfully.
Your weapon becomes a lightning rod.
Lightning courses through your body.

AttackTell.TellText: The onmyoji sweeps their arms wide, releasing a wave of purifying flame.

Outcome.ResponseText: You shield yourself against the searing wave.
You dive aside but flames still lick at you.
Your guard provides some protection from the inferno.
You can't parry a wave of fire.
The flames wash over you completely.

AttackTell.TellText: The onmyoji compresses multiple ofuda, spirit fire building to critical mass.

Outcome.ResponseText: You dive away but the explosion still catches you.
You hunker down against the explosive force.
Your guard helps but the explosion is omnidirectional.
There is nothing to parry against an explosion.
The fireball detonates with devastating force.

AttackTell.TellText: Ghostly hitodama spiral around the yamabushi before streaking forward.

Outcome.ResponseText: The spirit lights track you - you evade most but not all.
Your guard absorbs the ghostly impacts.
You steel yourself against the magical barrage.
You deflect some missiles but they reform and strike.
The hitodama pummel you relentlessly.

AttackTell.TellText: The yamabushi's eyes glow as they channel mountain spirit power.

Outcome.ResponseText: You fortify your mind against the psychic assault.
Physical defense offers limited protection against mental attack.
You can't dodge a mental attack.
There's nothing physical to parry.
The mental blast tears through your thoughts.

AttackTell.TellText: Dark tendrils reach from the yamabushi's tokin cap, seeking your ki.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard severs the dark connection.
You resist the draining through sheer will.
You pull away but tendrils still latch on briefly.
You can't parry intangible magic.
The drain pulls at your very life force.

AttackTell.TellText: The yamabushi traces forbidden mudra while chanting an ancient noroi.

Outcome.ResponseText: You strengthen your will and resist the curse.
You break line of sight but the curse partially lands.
Physical barriers mean little to curses.
You can't parry spoken words of power.
The curse settles into your bones.

AttackTell.TellText: Divine light gathers around the miko's gohei as she invokes Amaterasu.

Outcome.ResponseText: You evade the beam of sacred sunlight.
Your guard absorbs some of the divine radiance.
You endure the searing holy power.
You can't parry divine wrath.
Holy sunfire burns your very soul.

AttackTell.TellText: The miko performs kagura, calling down the judgment of the kami.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your spirit against divine reckoning.
You try to escape but the kami see all.
Your guard means nothing against divine will.
You cannot parry the heavens themselves.
Divine light sears you with holy judgment.

AttackTell.TellText: Pure white flames dance along the miko's hakama as she prepares to cast.

Outcome.ResponseText: You resist the purifying flames through willpower.
You roll aside, sacred fire singeing your clothes.
Your guard catches some of the holy fire.
You can't parry consecrated flames.
Sacred fire engulfs you.

AttackTell.TellText: The shikigami-tsukai opens a yomi portal beneath your feet.

Outcome.ResponseText: You leap clear as underworld tendrils grasp at air!
You slash at the tendrils, severing some.
Your guard prevents the worst of the grasping.
Bracing makes you easier to grab.
Yomi tendrils wrap around you, squeezing.

AttackTell.TellText: The shikigami-tsukai opens a swirling torii to the spirit realm.

Outcome.ResponseText: You anchor yourself to this realm through will.
Your guard provides focus against the pull.
You stumble away but the void's pull is relentless.
You can't parry dimensional magic.
The gateway tears at your essence.

AttackTell.TellText: The biwa hoshi's fingers find a jarring chord that resonates with dark spirits.

Outcome.ResponseText: You cover your ears and steel your mind.
Your guard does nothing against the sound wave.
You can't dodge sound.
You can't parry a sound wave.
The discordant note pierces your mind.

AttackTell.TellText: The biwa hoshi swings their heavy biwa lute like an improvised weapon.

Outcome.ResponseText: You easily deflect the clumsy swing!
You sidestep the unwieldy attack.
Your guard catches the unconventional weapon.
You take the hit - it hurts more than expected.
The biwa cracks against you - heavier than expected!

AttackTell.TellText: The biwa hoshi begins the Heike Monogatari, ghosts of the Taira manifesting.

Outcome.ResponseText: You focus your mind and resist the phantom memories.
You avert your eyes but still catch glimpses of the past.
Physical defense doesn't help against enchantment.
You can't parry a hallucination.
The ghostly tale consumes your attention completely.

AttackTell.TellText: The biwa hoshi's song shifts to a cutting satire about your failings.

Outcome.ResponseText: You steel your ego against the verbal assault.
Words cut deeper than swords sometimes.
You can't dodge an insult.
You can't parry words.
The mockery wounds your pride and focus.

AttackTell.TellText: The shikigami-tsukai throws paper dolls that unfold into a swarm of spirits.

Outcome.ResponseText: Your guard fends off the paper spirit swarm.
You hunker down against the tide of shikigami.
You evade some but they're everywhere.
You can only parry one at a time.
The paper spirits overwhelm you.

AttackTell.TellText: A ghostly arm materializes from an ofuda, coiling back like a whip.

Outcome.ResponseText: You duck under the spectral lash.
Your weapon disrupts the spirit arm.
Your guard catches the semi-corporeal strike.
The spirit lash phases partially through your defense.
The ghostly tendril lashes through you.
